entry.title: Monday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Wind becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
